rules_text: Amass 1, then amass 1 for each creature you control. When you do, you may have target Army you control deal damage equal to its power to target permanent, [i](To amass 1, then amass 1, create a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a 1, then amas. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black 1, then amas Army creature token first.)[/i]
